    99 Speed Mart Sdn Bhd Vacancies OFFICE DEPARTMENT ASSISTANT(部门行政助理)

    December 1, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    99 Speed Mart Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for OFFICE DEPARTMENT ASSISTANT(部门行政助理) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Requirements

    • Candidate must possess at least a Professional Certificate, Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Degree in Business Studies/ Administration / Management / Marketing / Secretarial or equivalent
    • Languages : English, Bahasa Malaysia, Mandarin(Deal with Mandarin Speaking Clients or Suppliers)
    • Good Attitude, Responsible, Hardworking and Able to multi-task
    • Computer literate
    • Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply
    • Working Location : HQ, Tmn Berkeley, Klang / Yong Peng, Johor / Batu Kawan, Penang

    Responsibilities

    • Provide assistance to manager in daily activities or preparing report or any documentation work
    • Monitors performance progress and perform administrative and office support activities
    • Coordinate the department activities and operations
    • Data entry and data analysis
    • Receives training and performs duties for the department
    • Perform to achieve department goals and objectives with upper management
    • Able to undertake the ad-hoc tasks and related duties as and when required from time to time

    Benefits

    • Entitlement of EPF, SOCSO and EIS
    • Annual Increment
    • Annual Bonus
    • Opportunity of Promotion
    • Ensure the Career Prospect
    • Panel Clinic is provided
    • Training is provided

    Requirements

    • 申请者需至少拥有专业证书，商业研究 / 管理 / 营销 / 秘书的学位证书，大学学位或同等学历
    • 需通晓英文，国文，中文(能应付用中文沟通的客户或供应商）
    • 拥有良好的态度，负责任，勤奋并且能够完成多项任务
    • 晓得如何操作电脑
    • 欢迎毕业生踊跃地申请
    • 工作地点：巴生总部 /  永平（柔佛）/ 峇都交湾（槟城）

    Responsibilities

    • 协助经理于日常工作，准备报告或任何文档工作·       
    • 监督部门的工作进度和执行有关部门的工作事项   
    • 协调部门的操作   
    • 输入并分析有关数据   
    • 接受培训并履行有关的职责   
    • 与高层管理人员一起实现部门目标
    • 需要承担临时的任务和相关的职责

    Benefits

    • 缴交公积金，社会保险金，就业保险
    • 拥有每年加薪与奖励的机会
    • 提供晋升机会
    • 职业前途保障
    • 拥有指定的诊所
    • 提供训练

    Company Overview

    99 SPEEDMART SDN BHD was established in 1987 in the form of a traditional "mom and pop" sundry shop. For now, 99 speedmart has operated more than 1000 outlets and keep expanding with employ more than 4500 people. We are one of the market leader in grocery market of Malaysia currently.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor - Others, Selangor - Others, Penang - Others.
    Apply Online
